description:

description:

description:
Disney’s acquisition of 20th Century Fox now allows Marvel full access to the X-Men movie franchise and other related properties, including Fantastic Four, to add to their shared universe. Sony, on the other hand, retains rights to the Spider-Man brand which requires the two studios to cooperate for Spidey to exist in the MCU. Unfortunately, [...]
